p: Adenoviruses are a frequent cause of epidemic infective conjunctivitis in LMICs and of RTIs in children and young adults worldwide. Outbreaks of adenoviral respiratory infections can occur in closed communities such as daycare centers, boarding schools, and among military recruits. Most adenoviral infections remain subclinical. Two adenovirus serotypes are associated with gastroenteritis and diarrhea (serotypes 40 and 41).
